pluginInfo.tool-description: IBM's integration broker from the WebSphere product family that allows business information to flow between disparate applications across multiple hardware and software platforms.

link.title: WebSphere Message Broker-CMP
link.description: Additonal information about WebSphere Message Broker is available here

release-notes.release-note: Installing this plugin will give you access to the steps listed below. These steps can be used when designing a component process.
Add a new step for deleting Message Flows that match a regular expression. Useful for deploying to shared Execution Groups.
Add channel property for all steps.
Add step for creating execution group if it doesn't exist.
Add step for creating and deleting configurable services.
Fixes APAR PI35342 - compatibility defect with IBM Urbancode Deploy version 6.1.0.4 and later.
Update plugin to allow for IIB v10 Support. Add step for overriding local bar files. Provide backwards compatibility between versions 7 through 10 of IIB.
Fixed issue with incremental deployment always being false
Fixed override bar file throwing null pointer, and IIB10 broker connection parameters
Fixes APAR PI55441 could not establish remote connection in IBM integration Bus step 'Create Execution Group' Fixes APAR PI52693 Null pointer exception when using the Override Bar Properties step

Additional Error Handling for APAR PI54665 timeout in UCD after deploy finished in IIB Added functionality to specify mqsiprofile script to set user environment per step Change names of plugin steps to remove "WMB"
Altered 'Create Execution Group' and 'Deploy' steps to allow multiple execution groups Add step for restarting execution groups.
Added property for setting environment variables to 'Deploy' step

release-note.p: Fixed NullPointerException in Create Or Update Configurable Service step.

release-notes.release-note: Altered 'Create Execution Group' step so that it will wait until execution group has finished generating before finishing.
Support property file encryption.

Fixed APAR 158492 Updated to a synchronous deployment. Fixed APAR 158710 Removed deprecated method from 'Create Execution Group.' Fixed APAR 158738 Added the missing property 'executionGroup' to 'Set Execution Group Properties' step. Changed to only establish a local broker connection if remote connection parameters aren't specified.
Added output property to specify completion code after deployment, added timestamps, and restructured plugin
Fixed APAR PI73557 Set Broker Properties is using a deprecated method which no longer works. Fixed APAR IT18861 Groovy classpath updated to include quotations.
Fixed APAR PI75953 Set execution group proxy before stopping all message flows. Changed Update Configurable Service to configure if missing properties should be deleted.

Fixed spacing error in IIBHelper. Added MQSI Profile and Shell properties to Override Bar Properties step. Removed manditory quotations to command lines calls. Error handling to createConfigurableService. Updated import path in Create, Delete, Start, and Stop Broker steps.
Add or update the hidden timeout property to many steps. Error catching for the Restart Execution Groups step.
Fixed APAR PI70440 Restart Execution Group step waits until the server has fully stopped before attempting to start.
Encrypt plugin properties.
Fixes APAR PI79634 Additional plugin decryption updates.

The following changes have been made to the Deploy step: It will now use the Timeout variable to determine its wait period. Halfway through the set Timeout, the step will check if the Bar file has been deployed. If a Success/Failure completion code has not been returned, it will query for a new result every 10 seconds until a success/failure response has been received or the Timeout has been reached.
